alert.note: Alert for Keith; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 6:58PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Perkins and southwestern Keith Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 558 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Venango, or 14 miles south of Big Springs, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brule, Brandon and Megeath. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 109 and 122. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM MDT for southwestern Nebraska.
